body:
Comment 2: 
On a related topic. It would be nice if the following articles were copied from the blog
to golang.org/articles/.

http://blog.golang.org/2011/05/gif-decoder-exercise-in-go-interfaces.html
http://blog.golang.org/2011/06/profiling-go-programs.html
http://blog.golang.org/2010/07/share-memory-by-communicating.html

This would make it possible to use relative links instead of absolute ones from
"docs.html" and "go_faq.html".
